restriction-delete: Name of option for protecting a page from deleting
restriction-protect: Name of option for protecting a page from changing protection settings
pmt-template-cclicense: Message to use on templates that indicates a CC license on file pages
pmt-template-unsigned: Message to use on templates to notice about unsigned messages on talk pages
pmt-template-usage: Messages to use on "Usage" paragraph on template documentations
pmt-template-usergroup: Message to use on templates that indicates user groups on user pages
